00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : Collision
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : David S. Whyte [david(at)ihpc.a-star.edu.sg]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

00029 
00030  SUBROUTINE Collision
00031 
00032 ! Common Variables
00033  USE NTypes,    ONLY : DBL
00034  USE Domain,    ONLY : inv12, inv6, ni, now, nxt, xl, xu, yl, yu
00035  USE FluidParams
00036  USE LBMParams
00037  IMPLICIT NONE
00038 
00039 ! Local Variables
00040  INTEGER :: i, j, ie, iw, jn, js
00041  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: sFx, sFy, iFs
00042  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: Vg, Vsq, Vg2, ux, uy
00043  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: rhon, invRho, phin, phin2, muPhin
00044  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: gradPhiX, gradPhiY, gradPhiSq, lapPhi
00045  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: Af0, Af1, Cfp
00046  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: Ag0, Ag1, Eg1A, Eg2A, Eg1R, Eg2R, geq
00047 
00048 !--------- Hydrodynamic fields and collision in the same loop ------------------
00049  DO j = yl, yu
00050    DO i = xl, xu
00051 
00052      phin  = phi(i,j)
00053      phin2 = phin*phin 
00054 
00055      ie = ni(i,j,1)
00056      jn = ni(i,j,2)
00057      iw = ni(i,j,3)
00058      js = ni(i,j,4)
00059 
00060 ! Laplacian
00061      lapPhi = ( phi(ie,jn) + phi(ie,js) + phi(iw,jn) + phi(iw,js)  &
00062             + 4.D0*(phi(ie,j) + phi(iw,j) + phi(i,jn) + phi(i,js)) &
00063             - 20.D0*phin )*inv6
00064 
00065 ! Gradient of the order parameter
00066      gradPhiX = ( 4.D0*( phi(ie,j) - phi(iw,j) ) + phi(ie,jn) - phi(iw,js) &
00067               + phi(ie,js) - phi(iw,jn) )*inv12
00068 
00069      gradPhiY = ( 4.D0*( phi(i,jn) - phi(i,js) ) + phi(ie,jn) - phi(iw,js) &
00070               - phi(ie,js) + phi(iw,jn) )*inv12
00071 
00072      gradPhiSq = gradPhiX*gradPhiX + gradPhiY*gradPhiY
00073 
00074 ! Chemical potential
00075      muPhin = alpha4*phin*( phin2 - phistar2 ) - kappa*lapPhi
00076 
00077 !--------- Hydrodynamics -------------------------------------------------------
00078 !  Local density value
00079      rhon   = g(i,j,0,now) + g(i,j,1,now) + g(i,j,2,now) + g(i,j,3,now) &
00080             + g(i,j,4,now) + g(i,j,5,now) + g(i,j,6,now) + g(i,j,7,now) &
00081             + g(i,j,8,now)
00082      invrho = 1.D0/rhon
00083 
00084 ! Interfacial force
00085      sFx = muPhin*gradPhiX
00086      sFy = muPhin*gradPhiY
00087 
00088 ! Velocity field at each node
00089      u(i,j,1) = ( g(i,j,1,now) - g(i,j,3,now) + g(i,j,5,now) - g(i,j,6,now) &
00090               - g(i,j,7,now) + g(i,j,8,now) + 0.5D0*sFx )*invRho
00091 
00092      u(i,j,2) = ( g(i,j,2,now) - g(i,j,4,now) + g(i,j,5,now) + g(i,j,6,now) &
00093               - g(i,j,7,now) - g(i,j,8,now) + 0.5D0*sFy )*invRho
00094 
00095      ux = u(i,j,1)
00096      uy = u(i,j,2)
00097 
00098 ! Pressure at each node
00099      p(i,j) = alpha*( phin2*( 3.D0*phin2 - 2.D0*phiStar2 ) - phiStar4 ) &
00100             - kappa*( phin*lapPhi + 0.5D0*gradPhiSq ) + Cs_sq*rhon
00101 
00102 !--------- Collision for order parameter distribution function -----------------
00103      Af1 = 0.5D0*Gamma*muPhin
00104      Af0 = -2.D0*Gamma*muPhin
00105      Cfp = invEta2*phin
00106 
00107      f(i,j,0,nxt) = f(i,j,0,now) + invTauPhi*(Af0 + phin   - f(i,j,0,now))
00108      f(i,j,1,now) = f(i,j,1,now) + invTauPhi*(Af1 + Cfp*ux - f(i,j,1,now))
00109      f(i,j,2,now) = f(i,j,2,now) + invTauPhi*(Af1 + Cfp*uy - f(i,j,2,now))
00110      f(i,j,3,now) = f(i,j,3,now) + invTauPhi*(Af1 - Cfp*ux - f(i,j,3,now))
00111      f(i,j,4,now) = f(i,j,4,now) + invTauPhi*(Af1 - Cfp*uy - f(i,j,4,now))
00112 
00113 !--------- Collision and Stream for momentum distribution function -------------
00114      Ag1  = rhon + 3.D0*phin*muPhin
00115      Ag0  = 2.25D0*rhon - 1.25D0*Ag1
00116      Eg1A = Eg1*Ag1
00117      Eg2A = Eg2*Ag1
00118      Eg1R = Eg1C*rhon
00119      Eg2R = Eg2C*rhon
00120      Vsq  = 0.5D0*( ux*ux + uy*uy )
00121 
00122 ! Direction 0
00123      geq = Eg0*( Ag0 - rhon*3.D0*Vsq )
00124      iFs = Eg0T*( -ux*sFx - uy*sFy )
00125      g(i,j,0,nxt) = g(i,j,0,now) + invTauRho*( geq - g(i,j,0,now) ) + iFs
00126 
00127 ! Direction 1
00128      geq = Eg1A + Eg1R*( ux + 1.5D0*ux*ux - Vsq )
00129      iFs = Eg1T*( (1.D0 + 2.D0*ux)*sFx - uy*sFy )
00130      g(ie,j,1,nxt) = g(i,j,1,now) + invTauRho*( geq - g(i,j,1,now) ) + iFs
00131 
00132 ! Direction 2
00133      geq = Eg1A + Eg1R*( uy + 1.5D0*uy*uy - Vsq )
00134      iFs = Eg1T*( -ux*sFx + (1.D0 + 2.D0*uy)*sFy )
00135      g(i,jn,2,nxt) = g(i,j,2,now) + invTauRho*( geq - g(i,j,2,now) ) + iFs
00136 
00137 ! Direction 3
00138      geq = Eg1A + Eg1R*( -ux + 1.5D0*ux*ux - Vsq )
00139      iFs = Eg1T*( (2.D0*ux - 1.D0)*sFx - uy*sFy )
00140      g(iw,j,3,nxt) = g(i,j,3,now) + invTauRho*( geq - g(i,j,3,now) ) + iFs
00141 
00142 ! Direction 4
00143      geq = Eg1A + Eg1R*( -uy + 1.5D0*uy*uy - Vsq )
00144      iFs = Eg1T*( -ux*sFx + (2.D0*uy - 1)*sFy )
00145      g(i,js,4,nxt) = g(i,j,4,now) + invTauRho*( geq - g(i,j,4,now) ) + iFs
00146 
00147 ! Direction 5
00148      Vg  = ux + uy
00149      Vg2 = invCs_sq*Vg
00150      geq = Eg2A + Eg2R*( Vg + 1.5D0*Vg*Vg - Vsq )
00151      iFs = Eg2T*( ( (1.D0 - ux) + Vg2 )*sFx + ( (1.D0 - uy) + Vg2 )*sFy )
00152      g(ie,jn,5,nxt) = g(i,j,5,now) + invTauRho*(geq - g(i,j,5,now)) + iFs
00153 
00154 ! Direction 6
00155      Vg  = -ux + uy
00156      Vg2 = invCs_sq*Vg
00157      geq = Eg2A + Eg2R*( Vg + 1.5D0*Vg*Vg - Vsq )
00158      iFs = Eg2T*( ( (-1.D0 - ux) - Vg2 )*sFx + ( (1.D0 - uy) + Vg2 )*sFy )
00159      g(iw,jn,6,nxt) = g(i,j,6,now) + invTauRho*( geq - g(i,j,6,now) ) + iFs
00160 
00161 ! Direction 7
00162      Vg  = -ux - uy
00163      Vg2 = invCs_sq*Vg
00164      geq = Eg2A + Eg2R*( Vg + 1.5D0*Vg*Vg - Vsq )
00165      iFs = Eg2T*( ( (-1.D0 - ux) - Vg2 )*sFx + ( (-1.D0 - uy) - Vg2 )*sFy )
00166      g(iw,js,7,nxt) = g(i,j,7,now) + invTauRho*( geq - g(i,j,7,now) ) + iFs
00167 
00168 ! Direction 8
00169      Vg  = ux - uy
00170      Vg2 = invCs_sq*Vg
00171      geq = Eg2A + Eg2R*( Vg + 1.5D0*Vg*Vg - Vsq )
00172      iFs = Eg2T*( ( (1.D0 - ux) + Vg2 )*sFx + ( (-1.D0 - uy) - Vg2 )*sFy )
00173      g(ie,js,8,nxt) = g(i,j,8,now) + invTauRho*( geq - g(i,j,8,now) ) + iFs
00174 
00175    END DO
00176  END DO
00177 
00178  RETURN
00179  END SUBROUTINE Collision
Generated on Mon Nov 10 16:43:11 2008 for ZSC-2D-STD-MPI by  1.5.6
